about_the_game:
Dive into a Fantasy World Filled with Bubbles and Cheerleaders, and Spark the Flames of Passion!

This game is a seamless blend of alluring visuals and puzzle gameplay that’s simple yet captivating.
Rescue the characters trapped within bubbles, and after each stage, the Bubble Girl will dazzle you with her irresistible charm.
Make it to the fourth stage for each character, and you'll unlock moments of fiery romance!

Meet the Cheerleaders:

Six stunning cheerleaders, each with their own unique personality, style, and preferences. Who will capture your heart?

Key Features:

  • 6 Gorgeous Characters
    Each cheerleader boasts a distinctive personality, taste, and style.

  • 24+ Dynamic Images
    Not just stills! Enjoy over 24 high-quality Live 2D animations that bring the characters to life.

  • Smooth & Natural Motion
    Crafted by top-tier animators, experience fluid and realistic character movements.

  • Simple yet Addictive Puzzles
    Intuitive gameplay that’s easy to pick up, with delightful surprises along the way.

  • User-Friendly Gallery Design
    Revisit your favorite scenes effortlessly with an intuitive gallery system.

Bubble Girl delivers an unforgettable experience, blending simple puzzles with steamy rewards. Start your journey now and create memories that will stay with you forever!

Community Goals & Rewards

Based on your support and engagement, we promise exciting updates to keep the fun alive!

  • 10,000 Sales Milestone
    Additional animations will be added to each character's fourth scene.

  • 30,000 Sales Milestone
    A new character joins the lineup, complete with four new scenes!

  • 50,000 Sales Milestone
    Each character will receive one additional scene.

  • 100,000 Sales Milestone
    Customization options will be added to all characters' fourth scenes.

  • 150,000 Sales Milestone
    Each character will get 2–3 new outfits to enhance the new customization features.

  • 200,000 Sales Milestone
    Customization will expand to include all scenes for every character.

Prepare yourself for a thrilling new experience with Bubble Girl.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not suitable for all ages, or may not be suitable for viewing at work: nudity or sexual content, general adult content. 

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.14+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Bubble girl

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4000, 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
